talk:
Hey, young man! Come
and drink some makgeolli

여기 광산에 보석들은 다 
이무기 똥이라고 하더라!
어떤 잘난 이무기가 있을까?

I heard that all the jewels here in the
mine are giant snake's poo! What kind
of brilliant giant snake is there?

용은 승천하려면 막 하늘도 
난다던데,자네는 자주 떨어지는거
 보니 용은 아니겠구만!

I heard dragons fly in the sky when
they go ascension, but you often
fall It's not a dragon!
